data.actual_result: Emoji picker collapses but stays active in the background, letting you type while having the emoji picker limitations
data.expected_result: Emoji picker closes and lets you use the abc keyboard normally
data.short_description: Editing a message after opening the emoji picker keeps emoji picker active in the background
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into any server - Send a message - Open the emoji picker - Long press your message and select edit - Press either cancel or save - Observe the emoji picker icon - Try to type out an emoji using a colon
